name: Murphy
text: Hey, watch out when you go into the grassland. I already live very close to it, but fortunately the enemies don't come that far south.

name: Murphy
text: But I heard from Roan that there are some interesting places in the grassland. What might be waiting there? Treasures? Enemies?

name: Murphy
text: For my part, however, it is enough for me to live here in the camp in peace.
